content.query:
CREATE PROC [dbo].[usp_UpdateClaimApprovalStatus] (@ClaimID VARCHAR(Max),@Checker int)
AS BEGIN 

IF @checker=1
UPDATE [dbo].[ClaimApprovalStatus_Dev]
SET IsClaimApproved = 1 WHERE ClaimFIRNo in (@ClaimID)

ELSE
UPDATE [dbo].[ClaimApprovalStatus_Dev]
SET IsClaimApproved = 0 WHERE ClaimFIRNo in (@ClaimID)

END
